product_name: Apex Ski Boots MC-S All Mountain Ski Boots - Men's - 2013/2014
long_description: The intermediate-level men's Apex MC-S All Mountain ski boots offer a soft flex with a 2-part system: warm, easy-to-walk in support boots lock into the rigid open chassis when it's time to ski. The men's Apex MC-S All Mountain ski boots offer a soft flex for new intermediate skiers and adjust to 70, 80, and 90 flex index to suit conditions. Easy to walk around in and very warm, the support boots feature Boa(TM) closures that make putting on the boots much easier than struggling with traditional ski buckles. Boa system tightens gradually using a simple twisting knob and lacing cables to produce even snugness throughout boots. Support boots feature grippy outsoles for excellent traction on snowy surfaces. When you are ready to ski, step into the open chassis and lock in support boots with ratcheting buckles. The chassis offer a direct connection to your skis and precise control thanks to their rigid construction, and they're designed to work very well with modern ski shapes. Custom-moldable liners offer a great fit right out of the box, but they may be custom formed using a heat treatment.
